notes: [Added] Auto Expire now allows to set custom date fields (in addition to Expiry Date and Post Date).
[Improved] Errors that might occur when rendering date templates no longer prevent the entry from saving.
[Improved] Auto Expire now writes logs into its own autoexpire.log file.
[Fixed] Fixed a bug where rules where not applied when `ElementsService::saveElement()` was called directly. For example when a “Resave all elements” task was triggered.
[Added] It is now also possible to add rules to set entry post dates.
[Fixed] Fixed a bug where some settings were not translated.
